+function collate(times) {
+  var out = [];

-    results.push([q, times[q], average(times[q], 'time')]);

+
+function fmt(re) {
+  var WIDTH = 20;
+  if (re.length < WIDTH) {
+    re = rpad(re, WIDTH);
+  }
+  if (re.length > WIDTH) {
+    var start = re.substr(0, WIDTH / 2);
+    var end   = re.substring(re.length - (WIDTH - start.length - 3));
+    re = start + '...' + end;
+  }
+  return re;
+}
+
+function num(n) {
+  n = Math.round(n);
+  var str;
+  if (n === 0.0)
+    str = '0.0'
+  else
+    str = ''+(n/1000);
+  return rpad(str, 6, '0')
+}
+
